verbs.description: [V: Flying] [ARG3: from a summit of allies] [ARG4: to one with North Korea] , [ARG1: Donald Trump] blew apart a carefully crafted effort at unity among major economic powers and escalated a fight with a steadfast military ally that buys the most U.S. goods .

[R-ARG0: Flying from a summit of allies to one with North Korea] , [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: blew] apart [ARG1: a carefully crafted effort at unity among major economic powers] and escalated a fight with a steadfast military ally that buys the most U.S. goods .
